name: WAVE FOR ME
description:
I made this game for AGBIC JAM which is based on fantasy Famicon cartridges. It is designed around one of those Cartridges with the title "Wave For Me" Information, like, game play... and stuff. I should probably write a small cute story fitting to the original Creators world and wording. But not less and not more than three lines.

This is my first finished Gamejam entry <3

I hope you have fun while playing, for more check out the rest of the description below:

C R E D I T S
This Games characters and its cover is designed by the wonderful Michael Schillingburg for his entry to this years My Famicase Exhibition.

Thank you again Michael for letting me fiddle with your Idea!

Thank you Gregor, Duc and Martin for playtesting my game during your lunch breaks!

C O N T R O L S

This game is played best on a regular keyboard with number keys (No numpad needed). Please be gentle and do not smash other peoples keyboards.

R E C O M M E N D E D   S P E C S

I ran this game on multiple windows and OSX machines before uploading, my recommended specs are build on my observation on the machines that where available to me:

  • Windows: Intel i5 with GTX 1050ti or better
  • OSX: MacBook pro (2013) or Later
  • Linux: Experimental
